definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: The meter reading will be the algebraic sum of all these sources.
sentences.chinese: 而电压表的读数则是所有这些源的代数和。

sentences.english: The ohmmeter uses an internal current source and electrometer voltmeter to make the measurement.
sentences.chinese: 欧姆计使用内部的电流源和静电计电压表来进行测量。

sentences.english: Reference junction compensation is required for thermocouple measurement with voltmeters.
sentences.chinese: 参考交界补偿所需的热电偶测量电压表。

sentences.english: Operation can be conducted after the indicating value of direct current voltmeter of the panel is zero.
sentences.chinese: 待面板的直流电压表的指示值为0时方可进行操作。

sentences.english: So, we should choose the voltmeters with high precision.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必须选用精度较高的电压表进行试验测量。

sentences.english: Digit, Display Low-Cost, Subminiature Digital Panel Voltmeters.
sentences.chinese: 位，显示低成本，超小型数字面板电压表。

sentences.english: The voltmeter leads are placed a known distance apart.
sentences.chinese: 电压表的引线则按已知的距离放置。

sentences.english: And even more interesting is the voltage meter and ammeter become free Charge by-product.
sentences.chinese: 而且更妙的是电压表和电流表成了免费的副产品。

sentences.english: Therefore, a voltmeter with high input resistance, such as an electrometer, is required.
sentences.chinese: 所以需要使用具有高输入电阻的电压表，例如静电计。

sentences.english: A kind of circuit for automatic range selection of voltmeters is introduced and designed.
sentences.chinese: 提出并设计了一种适用于电压表的量程自动转换电路。

sentences.english: Please return these ammeters and voltmeters on board as soon as they are rectified.
sentences.chinese: 电流表与电压表效正后请尽快送回船上。

sentences.english: And the excitation voltage and output were also fed through the selector switch to the digital voltmeter.
sentences.chinese: 其激励电压和输出也通过选择开关接到数字电压表上。
